description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Change is in the air, and the leaves are starting to fall.  Take control of a summer breeze, and keep the leaves from landing.  Too many leaves on the ground will bring about Autumn, so keep Summer going as long as possible!  Purchase the full version for the ability to store high scores, and to unlock a power-up that blasts leaves off-screen
description.short: Change is in the air, and the leaves are starting to fall.  Take control of a summer breeze, and keep the leaves from landing.  Too many leaves on the ground will bring about Autumn, so keep Summer going as long as possible!
